title: New Mortgage Loan Interface Increases Efficiency, Compliance (State of Illinois)
text: ( Source : State of Illinois ) CHICAGO - In an effort to save mortgage licensees valuable time and resources, the Division of Banking at the Illinois Department of Financial Professional Regulation (DFPR) has created a new Anti-Predatory Loan
